articles.author: Sharmila Kuthunur
articles.title: China's Zhurong Mars rover finds signs of recent water activity on Red Planet - Space.com
articles.description: Martian water played a major role in creating intriguing surface features on miniature sand dunes, scientists say.
articles.content: Scientists studying data from China's Zhurong rover have for the first time found cracked layers on tiny Martian dunes, which imply the Red Planet was a salt-rich watery world as recently as 400,000 … [+4826 chars]

articles.title: OnePlus will no longer sell the OnePlus Pad in Germany - 9to5Google
articles.description: OnePlus has confirmed that its first tablet, the OnePlus Pad, will no longer be sold in Germany, effective immediately.
